remarks: The domain of ` recs ` is all ordinals (lemma for transfinite recursion).  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 4-May-2019.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
statement:
tfrlemi14.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlemi14.2 $e |- ( Fun F /\ ( F ` x ) e. _V ) $.
tfrlemi14 $p |- dom recs ( F ) = On $.
$d A f x y $.
$d F f x y $.
